name: Moon (itch) (Pheola)
description:
“We are the night ocean filled
with glints of light. We are the space
between the fish and the moon,
while we sit here together.”

Rumi

This game was a simple exercise in creating a cyclical story using a very limited color palette with flickgame.org tool. 

To many more narrative mind-diversions,
Cheers,

Pheola
